body_html:
I have the same issue with 1.7.1...

OS Platform and Distribution: Windows 10
TensorFlow installed from: N/A
TensorFlow version: 1.7.1
Bazel version: N/A (used cmake and VS2017)
CUDA/cuDNN version: Cuda 9, cuDNN 7.1.3
GPU model and memory: 1070 MaxQ

Commands...
cmake .. -A x64 -G "Visual Studio 15 2017" -T host=x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_SHARED_LIB=ON ^
-Dtensorflow_CUDA_VERSION=9.0 -Dtensorflow_CUDNN_VERSION=7 -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX2 ^
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="D:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-1.7.1\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\install" ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE="C:\Program Files\swigwin-3.0.12\swig.exe" ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE="C:\Python36\python.exe" ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES="C:\Python36\libs\python36.lib" ^
-DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR="C:\Python36\include" ^
-DNUMPY_INCLUDE_DIR="C:\Python36\Lib\site-packages\numpy\core\include" ^
-DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER="C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.11.25503\bin\HostX64\x64\cl.exe"

MSBuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo /p:Platform=x64 /m:6 INSTALL.vcxproj /p:PreferredToolArchitecture=x64

The RelWithDebInfo build fails with the error:
“training_ops.cc(3508): error C2471: cannot update program database … tf_core_kernels.pdb”

(I tried adding CXXFLAGS=/FS but this didn't appear to solve the problem)

Release builds fine. Any help with debug support would be much appreciated!

body:
I have the same issue with 1.7.1...

OS Platform and Distribution: Windows 10
TensorFlow installed from: N/A
TensorFlow version: 1.7.1
Bazel version: N/A (used cmake and VS2017)
CUDA/cuDNN version: Cuda 9, cuDNN 7.1.3
GPU model and memory: 1070 MaxQ

Commands...
cmake .. -A x64 -G "Visual Studio 15 2017" -T host=x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=ON -Dtensorflow_BUILD_SHARED_LIB=ON ^
-Dtensorflow_CUDA_VERSION=9.0 -Dtensorflow_CUDNN_VERSION=7 -Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX2 ^
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="D:\TensorFlow\tensorflow-1.7.1\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\install" ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE="C:\Program Files\swigwin-3.0.12\swig.exe" ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE="C:\Python36\python.exe" ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES="C:\Python36\libs\python36.lib" ^
-DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR="C:\Python36\include" ^
-DNUMPY_INCLUDE_DIR="C:\Python36\Lib\site-packages\numpy\core\include" ^
-DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER="C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.11.25503\bin\HostX64\x64\cl.exe"

MSBuild /p:Configuration=RelWithDebInfo /p:Platform=x64 /m:6 INSTALL.vcxproj /p:PreferredToolArchitecture=x64

The RelWithDebInfo build fails with the error:
“training_ops.cc(3508): error C2471: cannot update program database … tf_core_kernels.pdb”

(I tried adding CXXFLAGS=/FS but this didn't appear to solve the problem)

Release builds fine. Any help with debug support would be much appreciated!
